attributes.action: Exempt all churches and places of worship from having to display A5 'No Smoking' signs at their entrance.  People do not smoke in churches and such signs are unsightly and unnecessary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Trust seem to have got some exemption for historic houses - why not churches?  Watch out they will be banning the lighting of candles and incense in church next!!
